column1: Molly likes animals.She has a cat.She has a dog.She has a bird.She has a hamster.She has a bunny.Her cat's name is Kitty.Her dog's name is Spike.Her bird's name is Polly.Her hamster's name is Barry.Her bunny's name is Snowball.Kitty plays with yarn.Spike plays with a ball.Polly plays in her cage.Barry runs on his wheel.Snowball eats carrots.
